Class SubstringTester

  • java.lang.Object
    • SubstringTester

  • public class SubstringTester
extends java.lang.Object
    Does the stuff for the recursive assignment.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • ascend

        public static void ascend(java.lang.String word)
        Prints the word and ascends as a substring through the word. Feeds to descend() before processing. Recursively ascends the string word as a substring cutting off the first element.
        Parameters:
        word - Any string
        Throws:
        none

      • descend

        public static void descend(java.lang.String word)
        Prints the word and descends as a substring through the word. Recursively descends through a string as a substring removing the last element.
        Parameters:
        word - Any string
        Throws:
        none
